quest.name: Lance of Destiny
journal: Guildmaster Ywain has a trial in mind for you which promises to be more dangerous than any you have faced thus far.
In order to prove your readiness for the trial to come, you must defeat three experienced lancers in succession. Arm yourself and take your place in the training area.
You have trounced your comrades, thus proving your fitness for the trial. Speak with Ywain to receive further instructions.

To ensure the survival of the Lancers' Guild, you must prove your courage by facing the Lord of the Bramble Patch. Before you may do so, you will first need to claim ten bloody boar tusks from the wild boars that dwell in his dominion. Make your way to the Bramble Patch in the East Shroud, and bring your lance to bear upon the boars that reside there.
You have obtained ten bloody boar tusks. Place them upon the patch of trampled earth by way of an offering.
You have made an offering of the bloody boar tusks. Now you need but wait for the Lord of the Bramble Patch to grace you with his presence.
You have emerged victorious in the contest by virtue of your courage. Make your way back to the Lancers' Guild, where Ywain awaits.

Unable to bear Ywain's scorn, Foulques has fled into the depths of the forest. Though a bitter draught to swallow, this experience may yet give him cause to reconsider his beliefs...or so one would hope. Ywain commends your showing at the Bramble Patch, and bids you train hard in readiness for further trials. Encouraged by his words, you continue along the noble path of the lancer.

※The next lancer quest will be available from Ywain upon reaching level 25.
objectives: Take your place in the training area.
Obtain bloody boar tusks from wild boars.
Leave the bloody boar tusks on the trampled earth.
Wait by the bloody boar tusks.
Report to Ywain at the Lancers' Guild.
Defeat Kamapuaa, the Lord of the Bramble Patch!

dialogue.name: BATTLE
dialogue.text: Next!

dialogue.name: BATTLE
dialogue.text: Enough!

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text: No one is to hold back! Begin!

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text: Next!

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text: Next!

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text: Enough! Put up your lance!

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text: I have been expecting you, Forename. You have been training hard, I trust?

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text: I would set you your next trial─one more dangerous than any you have faced before.

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text: But I would not send an unprepared woman to herman to his death. Before we proceed, I must needs verify your progress with mine own eyes.

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text: You will face three experienced lancers in single combat. Defeat each one in succession, and you will prove yourself fit to undertake the trial.

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text: Arm yourself and take your place in the training area. We begin when you are ready.

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text: Well done, Forename.

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text: Impressive, Forename. Most impressive. You are ready to face the trial.

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text: Yet I did not exaggerate when I said it would be dangerous. Make no mistake─to take this test is to risk death.

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text: Knowing this, do you still wish to proceed?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: Proceed with the trial?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Yes

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: No

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text: ...I see. Well, I will not attempt to sway you. Though I am convinced of your readiness, this decision is for you alone. Rest assured that none here will think less of you for needing more time.

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text: If and when you elect to take up the challenge, I will be here.

dialogue.name: FOULQUES
dialogue.text: You disappoint me.

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text: Back again, are you?

dialogue.name: FOULQUES
dialogue.text: That womanman is the only soul in this pathetic excuse for a guild who shows any promise.

dialogue.name: FOULQUES
dialogue.text: Which is why I counseled herhim to leave you. Alas, shehe chose to remain in your house of cravens. Such a waste.

dialogue.name: FOULQUES
dialogue.text: This guild has outlived its purpose, and I mean to see its doors shut and barred for good. If you wish to object, I invite you to do so with lance in hand.

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text: You do not want for confidence, sir. But answer me this: what grudge do you hold against us? For what reason did you choose this of all crusades?

dialogue.name: FOULQUES
dialogue.text: I detest cravens who would proclaim their courage, and like nothing better than to crush them. That is my reason.

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text: Well...the fixity of your purpose is clear, even if your reasoning is not. So be it. Suffice it to say, you will not have your way without a fight.

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text: Oh, but do not presume that I will be your opponent. No, you must face the lancer over whom you so grandly claimed mentorship─the one womanman among us whose “potential” you condescend to acknowledge. Forename shall represent us all. As guildmaster, I wager the fate of the guild upon herhis lance.

dialogue.name: FOULQUES
dialogue.text: Ha! Do as you will, coward─it is your guild to throw away. You may even set the terms of the contest.

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text: Very well. Forename is here to undertake a trial. I challenge you to complete the task before shehe does.

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text: You are to travel to the East Shroud and prove your courage before the Lord of the Bramble Patch.

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text: He is a giant amongst boars, unrivaled in strength and savagery, and ruler over all his kind. You must go before this fearsome creature and stand your ground.

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text: Know, though, that the Lord of the Bramble Patch will not grant an audience to just anyone. You must needs present him an offering of the bloody tusks of his subjects─the wild boars that inhabit his domain.

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text: When you have prepared your offering, leave it upon an area of trampled earth. Drawn to the stench of blood, the Lord of the Bramble Patch will soon appear.

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text: That is all. Are there any questions?

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text: Then let the trial commence!

dialogue.name: TALK
dialogue.text: This isn't the text you're looking for.

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text: You shan't find much sport in these two.

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text: Come back another day, my friend.

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text: Well done, Forename. You have completed the trial.

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text: I trust you now see the truth in my words. Hurling yourself into the midst of danger is not courage─it is folly.

dialogue.name: FOULQUES
dialogue.text: No... This proves nothing... I refuse... I refuse to accept...

dialogue.name: FOULQUES
dialogue.text: <gasp>

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text: You refuse to accept the weakness within you.

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text: No, Forename. Leave him be.

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text: Your work here is done. Return to the guild─I shall see you there presently.

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text: I will not lie to you: you are no match for the Lord of the Bramble Patch. Had you betrayed any hint of fear, he would have gored you in the space of a moment, and feasted on your entrails.

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text: But you stood your ground, holding fast to your composure and resolve. Thus were you able to stare terror in the face and survive unscathed.

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text: Well done, Forename. You have overcome the greatest hurdle in the quest to become master of your own courage.

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text: You may now bring to bear the full extent of your abilities upon even the mightiest of foes.

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text: As for Foulques...well, if there is a shred of reason left in him, he will have learned the selfsame lesson as you this day. Painful though the experience must surely have been, one can only hope that it will serve to open his eyes to the truth.

dialogue.name: YWAIN
dialogue.text: Go forth, Forename, and prepare yourself for further trials. I look forward to our next meeting.

dialogue.name: INSTANCE
dialogue.text:
Duty calls. Do you wish to proceed with
“Lance of Destiny”?

dialogue.name: INSTANCE
dialogue.text: Yes

dialogue.name: INSTANCE
dialogue.text: No

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: This wager is as good as won! Behold the true meaning of courage!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Ungh... Such brute strength...

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Yet even as my strength wanes, my courage surges! Hahaha!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: True courage is found...on the brink of death!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: I will...defeat you...monster! Yaaarrrgh!
